channel.title: Help with clients
channel.description: ok all i want to know is..when i dl a source i click on run.bat and it pops up a client...thats ok. but how do i log on..when i use tha client like 127.0.0.1 and try to log on...i get error connecting...not only that but the cmd dont say anything...plz help im confused bout it -.-

item.title: Help with clients
item.dc:creator: @Evanz Evanz
item.description:
@Evanz wrote:

1: your not running a server…

2: your server blocks out clients

Read full topic
